injectables.name: AppEffects

properties.name: getI18n
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(AppInitializationActions.setLanguage, NavActions.changeLanguage),
    withLatestFrom(this.store.select(selectTranslations)),
    filter(([action, i18n]: [SetLanguageAction, I18n]) => !i18n || !i18n[action.language]),
    exhaustMap(([action, _]: [SetLanguageAction, I18n]) => this.i18nService.getI18n(action.language).pipe(
      map((i18n: I18n) => I18nApiActions.getI18nSuccess({i18n})),
      catchError(() => of(I18nApiActions.getI18nFailure()))
    ))
  )

injectables.name: AuthApiEffects

properties.name: login
logout
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ErrorInterceptorActions.logout, NavActions.logout),
    exhaustMap(() => this.authService.logout().pipe(
      map(() => AuthApiActions.logoutSuccess()),
      catchError(() => of(AuthApiActions.logoutFailure()))
    )),
  )

properties.name: redirectWhenLoggedIn
redirectWhenLoggedOut
refreshToken
register$
resetPassword$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ResetPasswordContainerActions.resetPassword),
    exhaustMap(({password, resetPasswordToken}) => this.authService.resetPassword(password, resetPasswordToken).pipe(
      map((user: User) => AuthApiActions.restPasswordSuccess({user})),
      tap(() => this.snackBarService.openSnackBar('auth.reset-password.success')),
      catchError(() => of(AuthApiActions.restPasswordFailure({error: 'authBackend.resetPassword.failed'})))
    )),
  )

properties.name: sendPasswordResetMail$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ForgotPasswordContainerActions.requestEmail),
    exhaustMap(({email}) => this.authService.forgotPassword(email).pipe(
      map(() => AuthApiActions.forgotPasswordSuccess()),
      catchError(() => of(AuthApiActions.forgotPasswordFailure()))
    )),
  )

injectables.name: AuthService
CookbookEffects

properties.name: chooseActiveCookbookId$
createCookbook$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(CookbookContainerActions.createCookbook),
    exhaustMap(({title, optimisticId}) => this.cookbookService.saveCookbook(title).pipe(
      map((cookbook: Cookbook) => CookbookApiActions.createCookbookSuccess({optimisticId, cookbook})),
      catchError(() => of(CookbookApiActions.createCookbookFailure({optimisticId})))
    ))
  )

properties.name: deleteCookbook$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(CookbookContainerActions.deleteCookbook),
    filter(({cookbook}) => !!cookbook.id),
    mergeMap(({cookbook}) => this.cookbookService.deleteCookbook(cookbook.id!).pipe(
      map(() => CookbookApiActions.deleteCookbookSuccess({cookbook})),
      catchError(() => of(CookbookApiActions.undoDeleteCookbookFromState({cookbook})))
    ))
  )

properties.name: deleteRecipe$
editCookbook$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(CookbookContainerActions.editCookbook),
    concatMap(({cookbook}) => this.cookbookService.editCookbook(cookbook).pipe(
      map((editedCookbook: Cookbook) => CookbookApiActions.editCookbookSuccess({cookbook: editedCookbook})),
      catchError(() => of(CookbookApiActions.editCookbookFailure()))
    ))
  )

properties.name: editRecipe$
loadCookbooks$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(CookbookContainerActions.loadCookbook),
    withLatestFrom(this.store),
    exhaustMap(([_, store]) => this.cookbookService.loadCookbooks(store.appState.user?.id!).pipe( // select userId from state
      map((cookbooks: Cookbook[]) => CookbookApiActions.loadCookbookSuccess({cookbooks})),
      catchError(() => of(CookbookApiActions.loadCookbookFailure()))
    ))
  )

properties.name: loadRecipes$
navigateToCookbook$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(CookbookApiActions.createRecipeSuccess, CookbookApiActions.editRecipeSuccess),
    tap(({recipe}) => this.router.navigate(['/cookbook'], {queryParams: {selectedCookbookId: recipe.cookbookId}}))
  )

properties.name: saveRecipe$
setQueryParameterForActiveShoppingList$
switchCookbookWhenDeleted$

properties.name: addShoppingListItem$
bulkUpdateShoppingListItem$
changeShoppingListIfCurrentGetsDeleted$
chooseCurrentShoppingList$
createShoppingList$
deleteShoppingListIfCurrentGetsDeleted$
deleteShoppingListItem$
editShoppingList$
getShoppingListItems$
getShoppingLists$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ShoppingListContainerActions.loadShoppingLists, CookbookContainerActions.loadShoppingLists),
    withLatestFrom(this.store.select(selectUserID)),
    filter(([_, userId]) => !!userId),
    exhaustMap(([_, userId]) => this.shoppingListService.getShoppingLists(userId!).pipe(
      map((shoppingLists: ShoppingList[]) => ShoppingListApiActions.loadShoppingListsSuccess({shoppingLists})),
      catchError(() => of(ShoppingListApiActions.loadShoppingListsFailure()))
    )),
  )

properties.name: moveShoppingListItem$
selectNewlyCreatedShoppingList$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ShoppingListApiActions.createShoppingListSuccess),
    map(({shoppingList}) => ShoppingListEffectActions.setActiveShoppingList({shoppingListId: shoppingList.id})),
  )

components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  class="button"
  [disabled]="isDisabled"
  [attr.data-test]="e2eTestName"
  [type]="buttonType"
  (click)="onClick($event)"
  [ngClass]="{
  'button--no-left-border-radius': isInputGroup,
  'button--color-inverted': color === 'inverted' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-accent': color === 'accent' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-warning': color === 'warn' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-disabled': isDisabled,
  'button--warning-border': isInputGroup && hasErrors
  }"
>
  <fa-icon *ngIf="iconLeft"
           [icon]="['fas', iconLeft]"
           class="icon-left"
  ></fa-icon>
  {{buttonText}}
  <fa-icon *ngIf="iconRight"
           [icon]="['fas', iconRight]"
           class="icon-right"
  ></fa-icon>
</button>

components.name: CookbookContainerComponent
components.templateData:
<app-cookbook-page
  [translations]="translations$ | async"
  [currentLang]="currentLang$ | async"
  [recipes]="recipes$ | async"
  [cookbooks]="cookbooks$ | async"
  [selectedList]="selectedCookbook$ | async"
  (deleteRecipe)="onDeleteRecipe($event)"
  (editRecipe)="onEditRecipe($event)"
  (clickRecipe)="onClickRecipe($event)"
  (inputChanged)="onInputChanged($event)"
  (createRecipe)="onCreateRecipe()"
  (createList)="onCreateList()"
  (selectList)="onSelectList($event)"
  (editList)="onEditList($event)"
  (deleteList)="onDeleteList($event)"
></app-cookbook-page>

StringUnion
variables.defaultValue:
<UnionType extends string>(...values: UnionType[]) => {
  Object.freeze(values);
  const valueSet: Set<string> = new Set(values);

  const guard = (value: string): value is UnionType => {
    return valueSet.has(value);
  };

  const check = (value: string): UnionType => {
    if (!guard(value)) {
      const actual = JSON.stringify(value);
      const expected = values.map(s => JSON.stringify(s)).join(' | ');
      throw new TypeError(`Value '${actual}' is not assignable to type '${expected}'.`);
    }
    return value;
  };

  const unionNamespace = {guard, check, values};
  return Object.freeze(unionNamespace as typeof unionNamespace & { type: UnionType });
}

src/app/core/models/model.ts.name: StringUnion
src/app/core/models/model.ts.defaultValue:
<UnionType extends string>(...values: UnionType[]) => {
  Object.freeze(values);
  const valueSet: Set<string> = new Set(values);

  const guard = (value: string): value is UnionType => {
    return valueSet.has(value);
  };

  const check = (value: string): UnionType => {
    if (!guard(value)) {
      const actual = JSON.stringify(value);
      const expected = values.map(s => JSON.stringify(s)).join(' | ');
      throw new TypeError(`Value '${actual}' is not assignable to type '${expected}'.`);
    }
    return value;
  };

  const unionNamespace = {guard, check, values};
  return Object.freeze(unionNamespace as typeof unionNamespace & { type: UnionType });
}
